General.Name: Nakoda Group of Industries Limited
General.Description: Nakoda Group of Industries Limited manufactures and sells natural ingredients in India. It offers bakery ingredients, edible seeds and nuts, dry fruits, jams, fruit pulps, makhanas and popcorn, amla products, invert sugar products, candies, dehydrated fruits, cotten bales, tutti fruity, karonda cherries, sweet lime peels, orange cut peels, sesame seeds, sauces, spices, pickles, papads, canned vegetables, and frozen fruits and vegetables under the Samrat & Nakodas brand name. The company exports its products to the Middle East and European countries. It serves ice-cream factories, bakeries, sweet and namkeen factories, airline companies, railway catering, cotton and cloth mills, food factories, pharmaceutical, and Indian military. Nakoda Group of Industries Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Nagpur, India.
General.Address: Plot No. 239, South Old Bagadganj, Nagpur, India, 440008
